column3: I suggest that you check where the information has come from and consider leaving politics out of the decision making process for your own personal health decisions? If you had cancer and needed chemo would you really care who made the drug or would you simply want to get treated to get better?
column4: I suggest you fact check any links you share - check where the information has come from - try using snopes to verify.
column5: So you would put your politics above the health of other people? Vaccination is not just to protect you.
column6: Children aren't being forced to have the vaccination, its for their parents of guardians to do their research and decide on the risk vs benefits, Floridas results are just one aspect to be looked at.
